comment: /**  * Returns a {@link CompletableFuture} that has failed with the exception  * provided as argument.  * @param throwable the exception to fail the future with.  * @return The failed future.  */
code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ // Future Completed with an exception. // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ /**  * Returns a {@link CompletableFuture} that has failed with the exception  * provided as argument.  * @param throwable the exception to fail the future with.  * @return The failed future.  */ public static <T> CompletableFuture<T> getFailedFuture(Throwable throwable) {     CompletableFuture<T> failedAttempt = new CompletableFuture<>().     failedAttempt.completeExceptionally(throwable).     return failedAttempt. }
